values.description: To be updated

A perfect way to start your day!

Bonjour Breakfast is the first and only Brighton based company to bring the finest breakfast produce directly to your door.

Whether you have guests, wish to celebrate in a holiday rental or impress work colleagues - our eco-friendly breakfast boxes will hit the spot. From superb pastries, tarts and porridge to Champagne, juice and hand-made, organic chocolates. 

Think of Bonjour Breakfast as posh hotel room service, delivered to your house, hotel room or place of work – no fuss, no preparation. Each of our breakfast boxes arrive tied with beautiful ribbon and contain recycled spoons, knives and napkins.

We supply local produce wherever possible. Stockists include Cocoa, an award winning French Patisserie, Payne’s Sussex honey, Chocoholly Chocolates and award winning EllesBelles sausages. We also supply Grasshopper Porridge which is eco friendly, organic and delicious.

The menu is constantly changing and seasonal so please continue to check the website. 
www.bonjourbreakfast.com

values: Regular deliveries, special occasions, hens & weekends away

If I don't have an opening or candidate to fit you today, there is a good chance I will later, or I can find it. Tell me your story and I will begin my search. I have 15+ years experience networking in the Bay Area I know A LOT of people and I always run my business ethically and with integrity.
values.name: Brighton Search Group
CS Partners
values.description:
CS Partners is a company composed of experienced educational service providers. We are a hands on, service oriented company made up of educators with over 200 combined years of experience in public schools, who have been working for charter schools in Michigan from the beginning! The CS Partners staff has been intimately involved with the formation and ongoing operation of Charyl Stockwell Academy in Hartland and Brighton, FlexTech High School in Brighton, Crescent Academy  in Southfield and nine other charter schools and two day care centers. Since their inception, these schools have consistently maintained rising enrollment, balanced budgets and boast effective school reform programs.
 
Our focus is educational reform. We believe that educational service providers should be led by professional educators with experience in multiple forms of education. We also believe that a particular school reform or school model is not as important as professional leadership and the use of research-tested methods and structures. We believe that professional educators know how to be successful in teaching children, but they need to escape the oppressive bureaucracy of the traditional system. With that in mind we have created a School Services Team to assist our school leaders in every aspect of school operations from curriculum, assessment, school climate and culture, special education, leadership development and support, compliance, facilities, marketing, fiscal service, human resources and more. Educators in charter schools need a clear mission, a strategy to implement that mission, the freedom to work, and the time needed to focus on students, teachers and parents. It’s our job as educational service providers to help them every step of the way.
 
We are a results-driven management firm, made up of highly regarded educators from the traditional and charter school systems. Our size and our location allow us the flexibility to be responsive and hands-on.

OLM Group consists of: OLM Systems, Hytec and Pavilion. Together we deliver integrated solutions for the health and social care markets:

- Software solutions / software applications 
- Technology and infrastructure expertise 
- Consultancy 
- Media and communication services 

Headquartered in Teddington, Middlesex, OLM Group employs over 240 staff with local offices in Brighton, Cwmbran, Glasgow and Oxford.  A Deloitte & Touche Technology Fast 50 winner 6 years in succession, the company has grown from a first year turnover of £70k in 1992 to a turnover of £20m in 2009.

values: media and communication services for health and social care markets

A Healthy Day.org
values.description:
We are a social enterprise working to create healthier lives for families in Brighton.

Our vision is to provide an affordable and healthy food delivery service, along with the resources families need to help them make better food choices.


What we do:

- Weekly deliveries of affordable and healthy food directly to your door

- Weekly meal planning guides to help you get the most out of your food

- Simple recipes and meal ideas to make for you and your family

- Regular cooking workshops and community kitchen events

- Personal advice on healthy eating and food choices

values.name: NaturalMotion
values.description:
NaturalMotion Ltd is a leading games and technology company based in Oxford, London, San Francisco, and Brighton. Its high-end mobile games label, NaturalMotion Games, is one of the most successful and fastest growing mobile gaming companies in the UK.

The company creates ultra-high quality free-to-play games that combine polished gameplay with high-end 3D graphics.

NaturalMotion Games’ released CSR Racing for iOS in July 2012. It reached number 1 in the Top Free and Top Grossing charts in over 70 countries worldwide and was the only title featured on stage during Apple’s WWDC 2012 conference. The company announced that the game generated more than $12 million revenue a month
The company’s next title, Clumsy Ninja, was revealed during Apple’s iPhone 5 keynote. 

NaturalMotion Technology produces leading animation software products such as the award-winning euphoria engine -  a break-through in real-time character animation, and used in games such as GTA IV, Red Dead Redemption and Max Payne 3. NaturalMotion’s other run-time animation product, Morpheme, is the industry’s first graphically authorable animation engine. Morpheme is the most widely used animation engine in the console and PC games industry.

values.description:
GraphicNation is Mia Brignull’s online portfolio. I am a Brighton-based digital illustrator and graphic designer.

As a graphic artist, I have an enthusiasm for all things visual: online and printed. I aim to provide solutions that are perfectly suited to the client’s needs, and that always push the boundaries of creativity. Some of my freelance clients include Sky, CNet, Virgin Media, Digital Brain and the Metropolitan Police.

Before I became a freelancer, I worked at CNet UK as a Senior Graphic Designer. I created many of their internal promotion banners and article images that are still used on their site today. Prior to that I produced animations, infographics and visual assets for elearning programs at Digital Brain and Epic in Brighton.

If you have a project in mind, contact me today. I can discuss your requirements and provide a detailed quote, with no obligations.
values.name: GraphicNation

values.description:
Brighton and Hove's only unique one-stop shop of wedding services, a collaboration of the City's independent wedding service specialists from photography, florists, bespoke wedding dresses, cakes, jewellery, and much more.

Each of the services are experienced with weddings and we know just how important it is that the day is perfect for all fiancé's and bride's to be.  The directory of services has been handpicked by the Wedding Boutique to bring the very best that the City of Brighton and Hove has to offer.

The exciting bit is that in addition to the exclusive directory of services, the Wedding Boutique will be hosting regular Wedding Events and show casing these services allowing couples and their families to indulge in a unique wedding style experience at each event that we hold.
values.name: Wedding Boutique
